Package eu.clementime.rds

Class Summary
ActionsManager Action manager manages the display of the 3 actions the doll can do during the game, when touching an item, animation, or area: take, look at or talk to.
Anim Every animation: landscape animation or characters (=looping and not moving animation, called static animations) and animation sequences, for story (=looping or not, moving or not).
Area Area the doll is able to look at in the background (no sprite).
Background Background class manages the whole background: background & foreground images but also screen items, animations and areas the doll is confronted with.
Backup Backup methods called by DevTools class.
Constants All constants used in the game.
DatabaseAccess All queries are stored in DatabaseAccess class.
DatabaseHandler This class allows access to database during the whole game; documentation about it isn't very clear at the moment, my deepest apologies.
DevTools Screen tools for dev.
Doll Everything about our sweet tiny little doll.
Exit Animated sprite showing possibility to go to another screen.
GameTools Game tools manage all tools that are used to play: pointers, moving arrows and action manager.
Inventory Inventory manages items the doll has taken:
> normal view is open when the doll is touched, showing all inventory items,
> zoom view is open when clicking on an item,
> drag and drop is allowed in normal view to combine inventory item with screen item,
> and in zoom view to combine 2 items in inventory.
InventoryItem Item stored in doll inventory, with small sprite for normal view, big sprite for zoom or drag and drop, and inventory item sprite itself for...
RdsGame This class contains the database handler in order to have it during the whole game.
Screen Screen class is the main class of the game, and manages starting/closing game, player touch, loop game and running animations.
ScreenItem Items that are displayed on screen.
Talk This class manages talking bubbles between doll and characters.
World This class contains playing rules (for actions, triggering, database modifiers, saving, settings, walking...) and controls database access.
